name: City of Revere v. Massachusetts General Hospital
Arizona Governing Committee for Tax Deferred Annuity and Deferred Compensation Plans v. Norris
Memphis Bank & Trust Company v. Garner
Regan v. Taxation With Representation of Washington
question: Does the IRS violate the First Amendment by denying 501(c)3 tax-deduction privileges to non-profit groups that participate in "substantial lobbying"? Does the IRS violate the equal protection component of the Fifth Amendment by denying 501(c)3 tax-deduction privileges to non-profit groups that participate in "substantial lobbying"?

name: California ex rel. State Lands Comm'n v. United States
American Paper Institute, Inc. v. American Electric Power Service Corporation
United Brotherhood of Carpenters & Joiners of America, Local 610, AFL-CIO v. Scott
Lockheed Aircraft Corp. v. United States
Crown Cork & Seal Company, Inc. v. Parker
W. R. Grace & Company v. Local Union 759, International Union of Rubber, Cork, Linoleum & Plastic Workers of America
American Bank & Trust Company v. Dallas County
United States v. Rodgers
question: Does section 7403 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 grant the government the power to order the sale of a home of a delinquent taxpayer, even if a third party has interest in the home as well?
description: A case in which the Court held that section 7403 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 does grant the government power to order the sale of a home itself, even if the delinquent taxpayer is not the only one with interest in the property.

name: Solem v. Helm
question: Did the sentence violate the Eighth and Fourteenth Amendments?

name: City of Los Angeles v. Lyons
question: Did Lyons's injunction against the use of police chokeholds meet the threshold requirements imposed by Article III of the Constitution?

name: Local 926, International Union of Operating Engineers, AFL-CIO v. Jones
Moses H. Cone Memorial Hospital v. Mercury Construction Corporation
Griggs v. Provident Consumer Discount Company
Morrison-Knudsen Construction Company v. Director, Office of Workers' Compensation Programs
Pennhurst State School & Hosp. v. Halderman
Dickerson v. New Banner Institute, Inc.
Federal Trade Commission v. Grolier, Inc.
Director, Office of Workers' Compensation Programs v. Perini North River Associates
Equal Employment Opportunity Commission v. Wyoming
Container Corporation of America v. Franchise Tax Board
Martinez v. Bynum
question: Did the Texas law violate the Equal Protection Clause of the Fourteenth Amendment?

name: Planned Parenthood Association of Kansas City, Missouri, Inc. v. Ashcroft
Bowen v. United States Postal Service
Pallas Shipping Agency, Ltd. v. Duris
Pacific Gas & Electric Company v. State Energy Resources Conservation and Development Commission
question: Did the California law unconstitutionally intrude into areas of federal authority as defined by the Atomic Energy Act?

name: District of Columbia Court of Appeals v. Feldman
United States v. Whiting Pools, Inc.
Bolger v. Youngs Drug Products Corporation
Jones & Laughlin Steel Corporation v. Pfeifer
United States v. Generix Drug Corporation
Associated General Contractors v. California State Council of Carpenters
National Labor Relations Board v. Transportation Management Corporation
Mennonite Board of Missions v. Adams
Exxon Corporation v. Eagerton
question:
(1) Does the National Gas Policy Act of 1978, preempt state regulation of oil and gas operations?

(2) Does the royalty owner exemption violate oil and gas operators’ rights under the Contract Clause of the U.S. Constitution?

(3) Does the pass-through prohibition violate oil and gas operators’ rights under the Contract Clause of the U.S. Constitution?

(4)Do the pass-through prohibition and royalty-owner exemption violate oil and gas producers’ rights under the Equal Protection Clause of the U.S. Constitution?
description: A case in which the Court held that the National Gas Policy Act of 1978, preempted state regulation of oil and gas operations.

name: City of Port Arthur v. United States
National Association of Greeting Card Publishers v. United States Postal Service
United States v. Security Industrial Bank
Marsh v. Chambers
question: Does the chaplaincy practice of the Nebraska legislature violate the Establishment Clause of the First Amendment?

name: Baltimore Gas & Electric Company v. Natural Resources Defense Council, Inc.
DelCostello v. International Brotherhood of Teamsters
Kolender v. Lawson
question: Is the California statute unconstitutionally vague?

name: Motor Vehicle Manufacturers Association of the United States, Inc. v. State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company
question: Was the NHTSA’s decision to rescind Modified Standard 208 arbitrary and capricious?

name: United States v. Knotts
question: Does police planting and tracking of a radio transmitter violate the Fourth Amendment?

name: Metropolitan Edison Company v. National Labor Relations Board
Verlinden B. V. v. Central Bank of Nigeria
question: Does Article III of the Constitution preclude Congress from granting jurisdiction to United States District Courts over a suit against a foreign sovereign by a foreign corporation, asserting claims having a substantial connection with the United States?

name: Shepard v. National Labor Relations Board
Burlington Northern Inc. v. United States
Lehr v. Robertson
question: Does New York law violate due process and equal protection within the meaning of the Fourteenth Amendment when a biological father who has no relationship with the child does not receive notice of adoption proceedings surrounding his child?

name: Immigration and Naturalization Service v. Miranda
Shaw v. Delta Air Lines, Inc.
Thurston Motor Lines, Inc. v. Jordan K. Rand, Ltd.
White v. Massachusetts Council of Construction Employers, Inc.
Jefferson County Pharmaceutical Assn., Inc. v. Abbott Laboratories
Falls City Industries, Inc. v. Vanco Beverage, Inc.
question: Is the meeting-competition defense of section 2(b) of the Clayton Act available only if the defendant sets its lower price on customer-by-customer basis and creates the price discrimination by lowering rather than by raising prices?

name: Guardians Association v. Civil Service Commission of the City of New York
Akron v. Akron Center For Reproductive Health
question: Did several provisions of the Akron ordinance violate a woman's right to an abortion as guaranteed by the Court's decision in Roe v. Wade and the right-to-privacy doctrine as implied by the Fourteenth Amendment?

name: Michigan v. Long
question: Did the Supreme Court have jurisdiction over state court decisions that rested on "adequate and independent" state grounds?

name: United States v. Sells Engineering, Inc.
Simopoulos v. Virginia
question:
(1) Does the prosecution’s failure to allege a lack of medical necessity for the abortion violate Due Process?

(2) Did the prosecution fail to prove that Dr. Simploulous’ acts caused the death of the unborn fetus?

(3) Is the Virginia law requiring all second trimester abortions to take place in licensed hospitals unconstitutional?

name: Brown v. Socialist Workers '74 Campaign Comm. (Ohio)
Newport News Shipbuilding & Dry Dock Company v. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission
Sony Corporation of America v. Universal City Studios, Inc.
question: Does Sony's sale of "Betamax" video tape recorders to the general public constitute contributory infringement of copyrighted public broadcasts under the Copyright Act?

name: Bob Jones University v. United States
question: Can the government prohibit race discrimination at the expense of the First Amendment's Free Exercise Clauses?

name: United States Postal Service Board of Governors v. Aikens
Arizona v. San Carlos Apache Tribe of Arizona
Minneapolis Star & Tribune Company v. Minnesota Commissioner of Revenue
question: Did the taxing scheme enacted by the Minnesota legislature violate the freedom of press guaranteed by the First Amendment?

name: Metropolitan Edison Co. v. People Against Nuclear Energy
Block v. North Dakota ex Rel. Board of University and School Lands
Xerox Corporation v. County of Harris
United States v. Place
question: Was the ninety minute seizure of the traveler's luggage a valid investigative stop under Terry? Did the "sniff test" by the dog constitute a search?

name: Idaho ex rel. Evans v. Oregon
Mueller v. Allen
question: Did the law violate the Establishment Clause of the First Amendment?

name: Barefoot v. Estelle
question:
(1) Did the district court err in rejecting the habeas corpus petition on the merits?

(2) Did the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit correctly deny a stay of execution of the death penalty pending appeal of the district court’s judgment?

name: Karcher v. Daggett
question: Did the gerrymandering in the reapportionment plan violate Article I, Section 2 of the Constitution?

name: Edward J. DeBartolo Corporation v. National Labor Relations Board
Dirks v. Securities and Exchange Commission
question: Did Dirks’ actions violate the antifraud provisions of the federal securities laws?

name: Connick v. Myers
question: Is the questionnaire that Meyers distributed constitutionally-protected speech?

name: Bill Johnson's Restaurants, Inc. v. NLRB
Perry Education Association v. Perry Local Educators' Association
question: Does a local school board violate the First Amendment by disallowing a nonofficial teachers union from using its internal school mail system?

name: Federal Election Commission v. National Right to Work Committee
Zant v. Stephens
question: Should the court grant habeas corpus to Stephens because one of the aggravating circumstances leading to his death sentence is now invalid?

name: Brown v. Thomson
question: Did the State of Wyoming violate the equal protection clause of the Fourteenth Amendment by allocating one of its state House seats to a county with a population considerably lower than the average population per state representative?

name: Arkansas Electric Cooperative Corporation v. Arkansas Public Service Commission
Franchise Tax Bd. of Cal. v. Construction Laborers Vacation Trust for Southern Cal.
IIllinois v. Gates
question: Did the search of the Gates's home violate the Fourth and Fourteenth Amendments?

name: First National City Bank v. Banco Para el Comercio Exterior de Cuba
New Mexico v. Mescalero Apache Tribe
Boston Firefighters Union, Local 718 v. Boston Chapter, National Association for the Advancement of Colored People
General Motors Corporation v. Devex Corporation
City of Lockhart v. United States
Public Service Commission of the State of New York v. Mid-Louisiana Gas Company
Energy Reserves Group, Inc. v. Kansas City Power & Light Company
question: Did the Kansas Natural Gas Price Protection Act violate the Contract Clause by preventing federal price controls on natural gas from affecting price adjustments made under intrastate contracts?

name: Community Television of Southern California v. Gottfried
Bush v. Lucas
question: Can a federal employee sue for damages for the violation of his First Amendment rights by his superior where Congress has provided a comprehensive remedial scheme, although one which does not fully compensate the employee for the harm suffered?
